summary: The Contoso Wireless TV has a number of features, including a 4K Ultra HD display, an intuitive voice search system, and access to popular streaming services. It comes with a one-year limited warranty that covers any defects in materials or workmanship. If something goes wrong during the warranty period, customer service will repair or replace the product. Repairs or replacements typically take between two and four weeks. The TV is also compatible with most home audio systems, comes preloaded with apps, and is Energy Star certified for energy efficiency.
